Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Position

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Position extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a position on a hypothetical Cartesian plane with x and y axes.

      Parameters:
